texts.en: Renato is 48 years old and lives with his wife and children. He is a very hardworking father. He started with rice cultivation on a plot of two hectares. For this, he needs 15,000 PHP to buy fertilizer and pesticides. In the future, Renato wants to expand his farm's area so that he can make more profits and save for his future.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticides.

loans.name: Marife

texts.en: Marife, a mother of four, is working in a private company and at the same time running a transportation services business to make a living. For over three years, it has helped a lot for their daily expenditures. She has repaid her previous loan, which she used for maintenance, successfully. To maintain better services, she took a new loan to purchase a new set of tires to replace the old and used tires. Her future dream is to improve the general living of her family.

loans.use: to purchase a new set of tires.

loans.name: Nerisa

texts.en: Due to high cost of commodities and school fees, Nerisa has been engaged in buying and reselling soft brooms and vegetables within the local community to support the education of her five children. She wants to make her business viable and profitable but she lacks capital. For this reason, she would like to access financial assistance from KIVA lenders through ASKI amounting to PHP 12,000 to buy more soft brooms and vegetables to resell. She believes that this financial assistance will make it possible for her to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy more soft brooms and vegetables to resell

loans.name: Rosalina

texts.en:
Rosalina is a married woman with four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Rosalina is 50 years old and has one child who is still in school.

Rosalina has a fishing/fish vending business in the Philippines. She requested a 11000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to purchase additional materials and equipment for her business.

Rosalina has been in this business for 25 years and she would like to build and expand it to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional materials and equipment for her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy a car to start taxi driving

loans.name: Myrna

texts.en: Myrna 52 years old, married, and has children. She has been farming for 15 years. She is requesting a loan which she will use to buy more rice fertilizers. Her profits will be used to pay for the schooling of her children. Myrna is asking for a loan amounting to PHP 25,000 so that she can meet all the needs of her family and she can also save money.

loans.use: to buy more rice fertilizers

loans.name: Estela

texts.en:
Estela is 58 years old and is married with four children. She works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a buy and sell nipa roofing business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional nipa to sell.

Estela has been in this business for 20 years. 

In the future Estela would like to save enough to build a house for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional nipa to sell

loans.name: Linda

texts.en:
Linda is 62 years old and a widow with two children.

She earns a living by farming rice in the Philippines. Linda is borrowing PHP 10000 through NWTF to buy fertilzers and other farm supplies.

Linda has been farming rice for 40 years and also earns additional income from a general store.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilzers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Teresa

texts.en:
Teresa is 35 years old and married with two children. With one child currently in school, Teresa works very hard to provide for them.

Teresa runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 18000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries like canned goods, candies, detergent soap, shampoo, cooking oil, noodles, etc. to sell.

Teresa has been in this business for 4 years and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, candies, detergent soap, shampoo, cooking oil, noodles, etc. 

In the future, Teresa would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries like canned goods, candies, detergent soap, shampoo, cooking oil, noodles, etc. to sell

loans.name: Dilafruz

texts.ru: Дилафруз жизнерадостная девушка. Ей 18 лет. Она живет с родителями и учится на первом курсе Таджикского Государственного Университета Коммерции. Дилафруз учится по специальности Мировая экономика. Она окончила среднюю школу с отличными оценками. Дилафруз владеет английским, немецким, турецким и русским языками. Она очень умная девушка и в будущем мечтает работать в какой-либо международной организации. Она запрашивает займ для оплаты учебного договора. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Dilafruz is a cheerful young woman.  She is 18 years old and lives with her parents.  She is currently a freshman at the Tajik State University of Commerce. Dilafruz is specializing in international economics. She has completed her high school with outstanding grades. Also, Dilafruz knows English, German, Turkish and Russian languages.  She is a very bright woman who dreams of working for an international organization in the future. She is asking for a loan to pay for her university tuition. Dilafruz is waiting for your kindness and is hoping for your generosity.

loans.use: To pay for her university tuition

loans.name: Fidencio

texts.es:
Fidencio, vive en un  núcleo familiar integrado por su esposa y dos hijos; su actividad económica es atender una granja de pollos y presta el servicio de transporte en su vehículo en el cual trabaja cuatro veces por semana.
Le será de mucha ayuda el capital que está solicitando para invertir en remodelación de la infraestructura de la granja, de esta manera mejorara la condiciones en las que tiene los pollos, aumentará la productividad y rentabilidad de su negocio, espera recuperar lo invertido en menor tiempo y con ganancias superiores.
Sus proyectos son remodelar su vivienda y comprar un terreno para cultivar.
texts.en: Fidencio lives in a nuclear family formed by his wife and two children. His work is to take care of a chicken farm and to render transportation services with his vehicle four times a week. The loan he is requesting will be of great help to invest in remodeling the farm's infrastructure, and therefore, he will improve the conditions of the chickens and will increase the productivity and profitability of his business. He hopes to recover what he has invested in less time and with increased earnings. His projects are to remodel his house and to buy a lot for cultivation.

loans.use: to invest in remodeling the farm's infrastructure and in this way improve the condition of the chickens.

loans.name: Farid Group

texts.en:
This group is called Farid and it consists of four women who are all hard-working. They live in Hodeidah, Yemen. They have taken a loan of 110,000 YER from AMB. 

Merfat is 42 years old and married with four children. They live together in a humble house in Hodeidah city. Her oldest child is 19 years old and the youngest one is 2 years old. 

In order to help her husband in covering the expenses of the family, she decided to sell many kinds of accessories and makeup door to door to the local residents in her area. She has been in this business for one year.  Most of what she earns goes to the expenses of the family and into expanding her business.

Merfat applied for a loan of 50,000 YER from AMB in order to purchase more accessories, makeup, and cosmetics for resale to the women in her area for the further expansion of her business.

Merfat expects a boost in her income. She looks forward to expanding her business through opening a small shop to sell more accessories, makeup, and ready-made women's clothes.

loans.use: to purchase more accessories, makeup, and cosmetics for resale.

loans.name: Mateo

texts.en: Mateo is a farmer who lives in a rural community. He earn a living through farming. He was also makes and sells soft brooms to have additional income. He aims to improve the living status of his family and give his children a better future. To make his business more profitable, he is asking for additional capital of 12,000 PHP to buy tiger grass and rattan needed to make soft brooms for sale. He believes that having this financial assistance will enable him to improve his business.

loans.use: to buy tiger grass and rattan needed to make soft brooms for sale

loans.name: Peris

texts.en: Peris is a married woman with two children. She describes herself as ambitious. She operates a retail business where she sells cereals. She has been involved in this business for five years. Her business is located in an area good for business, and her primary customers are individuals. She describes her biggest business challenge as the lack of finances. She will use the 70,000 KES loan to buy more maize. Her business goal is to expand within five years. She hopes that in the future she will be successful in business. She will use the anticipated profits to educate her children.

loans.use: to buy more maize

loans.name: Felisa

texts.en: Felisa  is from the village of Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She has been selling cosmetic products in her village to make a living. She also sells them in her workplace. She gained access to financial services after she joined GDMPC, and it helped improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities. Recently, she took a new loan to buy more cosmetic products to sell. She wants to have a better living in the near future to help her family.

loans.use: to buy more cosmetic products to sell

loans.name: Surayo

texts.ru: Сурайё выросла в семье государственного работника. Она с детства училась хорошо и активно участвовала во внеклассных мероприятиях. Любовь к учебе и ее стремление к светлому будущему заставила ее поступить в университет и продолжить учебу, несмотря на финансовые трудности семьи.  Она учится на 3 курсе Таджикского Государственного Университета Политики и Бизнеса. Сурайё учится по специальности Бухгалтерский отчет, анализ и аудит. Она является успешной студенткой. После окончания университета она хочет работать в банковской сфере. Она запрашивает займ для оплаты учебного договора. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Surayo grew up in the family of a government employee. From childhood, she did very well at school and actively participated in after-school activities. Her love for her studies and her drive for a promising future led her to enroll in university and continue her studies in spite of her family's financial difficulties. She is in her third year at Tajik State University of Politics and Business. Surayo is in the Department of Accounting Statements, Analysis and Auditing. She is a good student. After graduating from university, she wants to work in the banking sector. She is requesting a loan to pay for her university tuition. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to pay for her university tuition.

loans.name: Conchita

texts.en:
Conchita is 39 years old and married with four children. She works hard to provide for her family. 

She runs a nipa roofing business in the Philippines and has requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional nipa. Conchita has borrowed and repaid two loans from NWTF before this loan. She has run the nipa roofing business for 20 years, and also earns an income from tailoring.

She aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional nipa for her nipa roofing business

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy cooking ingredients and tailoring materials.

loans.name: Valeriana

texts.en:
Valeriana is 58 years old, married and has four children. 

Her spouse is a farmer and she operates a dress shop. She provides sewing services for school and office uniforms, curtains and tablecloths. She hopes to continue creating good output to satisfy her customer’s needs. 

She is asking for a loan of PHP 25,000 to buy fabrics, threads and machine oils for the sewing business. Valeriana will save additional revenue to invest in her networking business and for the educational expenses of her children. She will be happy to see them professionals someday.

loans.use: to buy fabrics, threads and machine oils for the sewing business.

loans.name: Jipe Moyo Yombo Group

texts.en:
Watende is a single woman in her mid 30s with one grown child.  

She operates a beauty salon, sells newspapers, and has a motorcycle.  She has been in her business for 6 years and works from 8am to 10pm daily to make a a good monthly profit.  

This will be Watende's 9th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  She used the previous loans to service the motorcycle, buy salon equipment ,and increase the newspaper inventory.  She is very  happy with the loan and used the profit to build her house and cover household expenses.  She will use this loan to buy more newspapers to resell.  She dreams of building another house. 

Watende will share this loan with her loan group "Jipe Moyo Yombo" which has two members who hold each other accountable to repay the loan.

loans.use: to buy newspapers to resell.

loans.name: Ezekiel

texts.en:
Ezekiel is a married man. He has two children. He describes himself as creative, faithful and tolerant. 

He operates a tailoring business where he makes clothes. He has been involved in this business for eight years. His business is located in an area with potential and his primary customers are ladies. 

He will use the KES 70,000 loan to buy more stock of tailoring materials. His business goal is to expand within five years. He hopes that he will have a bright future both family-wise and business-wise. 

This is his third loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. Previous loans were repaid successfully. He will use the anticipated profits to improve his business.

loans.use: to buy more stock of tailoring .

loans.name: Musonye

texts.en:
Musonye is 31-years-old and a farmer in Kakamega town. He grows vegetables, bananas and maize to sell. He is married and together, with his spouse, they have been blessed with 4 children. His spouse Dinah also provides additional income and he supports 5 people in her family.

He will be using this loan to buy goats and piglets to raise. With the anticipated profits, he plans to buy fertilizer and seeds for planting. 

This is his third loan term from VisionFund Kenya and he has successfully paid back his previous loans. In the future, he hopes to acquire some land and build a house for his family.

loans.use: to buy goats and piglets.

loans.name: Nicholas

texts.en:
Nicholas is a married man with 1 child. He describes himself as focused. He operates a  mill to grind maize into maize flour. He has been involved in this business for 6 years. 

His primary customers are the local people. He will use the 60,000 KES loan to buy more maize. His business goal is to excel within 5 years. He hopes that in the future, he will be a better business man. 

This is his third loan with SMEP Microfinance bank. He successfully repaid his previous loans. He will use the anticipated profits to pay school fees.

loans.use: to buy maize.

loans.name: Eva

texts.en:
Eva is 46 years old and married with four children, two of whom are in school. Eva works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 23,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc.

Eva has been in this business for 6 years.

In the future, Eva would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc.

loans.name: Mary Ann

texts.en:
Mary Ann is 45 years old and married with six children, three attend school.

She has grown  sugarcane for 6 years and requests 12,000 through NWTF to buy fertilizer and other farming supplies.

She earns additional income selling fish.

She works tirelessly to attain her dream which is to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and other farming supplies.

loans.name: Roja Shg - Irumoolai Group

texts.en:
Sangeetha (the featured borrower, who is standing with her hand raised) and five of her friends Sakila, Amsavalli, Jothi, Nagavalli and Rukkumani, have formed a group called "Roja." All hail from Irumoolai village of Tanjore in Tamil Nadu. 

Most of them are daily-wage laborers to help supplement their household income. These diligent women are unable to save money from their monthly income. A major chunk of their income goes towards buying firewood or kerosene, and a lot of their time is spent cooking over traditional "chulha" stoves. These chulhas, apart from being time-consuming, also emit a lot of smoke which plays havoc with their health. This adds to their medical expenses.
 
To tackle these problems, they have approached PAT (MicroGraam’s field partner) to buy Greenway cook stoves. The benefits of the Greenway cook stove are that it leads to fuel savings, minimizes emissions of CO, CO2, supports fast and convenient cooking, is highly durable, and is maintenance-free and smokeless. The stove operates on solid fuels such as wood, agro-waste, charcoal, coal and dry dung and does not require any refurbishing or recurring cost. 

They are seeking a group loan repayable in easy installments. Sangeetha, like the others, intends to use the loan to purchase a Greenway cook stove. Your loan will help these women to have better health and also save a little money.

loans.use: to buy a smokeless cook stove.

loans.name: Maria Ines

texts.pt:
A senhora Maria Ines de 30 anos de idade vive na casa propria é professora, casada e mae de 2 filhos ainda menores de idade sustenta uma sobrinha que vive com ela.
O valor do empréstimo irá comprar cimento, areia, pedra, varrões para a construção de sua casa.
Tem como projectos e sonhos terminar  a casa e mobilar para dar um lar condigno a sua famίlia e depois adiquirir uma viatura para uso familiar.
Diz que os principais desafios que tem enfrentado sao os financeiros  esta a estudar e seu marido tambem e professor que ajudara no pagamento das prestacoes e ira solicitar mais emprestimos para concretizar seu plano.
texts.en:
Mrs. Maria Ines is 30 years old and lives in a house she owns. She's a teacher, the mother of 2 children who are still underage and also supports a niece who lives with her.

This loan will be used to buy cement, sand, stone and rods for the construction of her house.

Her dream is to finish building her house and furnish it so her family can have a good home and then to buy a vehicle for family use.
She says her biggest challenges are financial ones. She is also studying and her husband - who is also a teacher - will help pay off the loan and they will request further loans to carry out their plans.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, stone, and rods.

loans.name: Venancia

texts.en:
Venancia owns and operates an agricultural business, raising vegetables for sale. Her family helps her in working on her farm and delivering their farm produce in the market. For many years, she has sustained her farm and plans to expand it. She has successfully repaid her previous loan, which she used for buying seedlings and fertilizer. 

To improve her farm, she took a new loan recently to purchase organic fertilizer. Venancia has requested a loan of 30,000 PHP to purchase seedlings and fertilizers. She hopes that her farm will expand and flourish to sustain her family's basic needs.

loans.use: to purchase organic fertilizer and seedlings.

loans.name: Bidii Group

texts.en:
Jeremia  is a married man in his mid 20s  with two children, both attend school.  He has been selling chips with eggs,  meat ball, and chicken for three years.  He works from 8am to mid-night daily  to make a good monthly profit.

This will be Jeremia's 1st loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  He will use this loan to buy Irish potatoes, cooking oil, cooking charcoal, and renovate his place of business.  He dreams of building his own house.

Jeremia will share this loan with his loan group "BIDII" which consist of five members who hold each other accountable for repaying the loan.

loans.use: to buy Irish potatoes, cooking oil,  cooking charcoal, and renovate his place of business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy more cereal stock.

loans.name: Isabelita

texts.en:
Isabelita works hard to support her family. She is married, and has a buy and sell nipa roofing business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase an additional bundle of nipa to sell.

Isabelita has been in this business for 10 years now.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase an additional bundle of nipa

loans.name: Jose Andres

texts.es:
José, tiene 31 años de edad,  es casado, su familia está integrada por su esposa y un hijo, viven todos juntos,  posee un negocio desde hace 10 años, el cual consiste en atender un taller  de estructuras metálicas, aprendió el oficio trabajando como ayudante con un amigo, posteriormente con su experiencia decidió fundar su propio negocio, lo desempeña en un horario de siete de la mañana a cinco de la tarde.
Utilizará el capital para comprar hierro, láminas, tubos, pintura y otros materiales con los que realizara un mejor trabajo, espera tener mejores ingresos, finalizar sus trabajos en menor tiempo y cancelar la deuda con buen record crediticio.
José desea ampliar su negocio, mejorar la situación económica, dar a su familia una mejor alimentación, vestuario y educación.
texts.en:
José is 31 years old. He is married and his family includes his wife and son who live together. He has owned a business for 10 years which is a workshop for metal structures. He learned the trade by working as an assistant for a friend then he decided to start his own business with the experience. It operates from the time of 7 am to 5 pm. 
He will use the loan to buy iron sheeting, pipes, paint, and other material to perform better work. He expects higher income, to complete his work in less time, and to pay off his loan with a good credit record.
José wants to expand his business, improve his economic situation, and give his family better food, clothing, and education.

loans.use: to purchase materials for his metal shop

loans.name: Jimmy

texts.en:
Jimmy is a hardworking, honest and humble man who is 30 years old. He is from the Kerugoya area of Kenya, which is an area that experiences good weather and supports farming. 

Jimmy has a very beautiful and hardworking wife who takes care of the domestic chores. Jimmy was raised in a humble background and he never got the opportunity to advance his education, but he did not lose hope. He has farmed for 10 years. He has been able to take care of his family and provide for their basic needs. 

Jimmy loves dairy farming and has nicknamed his cow “Blacky.”  Although Jimmy makes a profit, not everything has been easy for this humble and industrious man. He wants to increase his crop production and seeks a loan to purchase farm implements that will boast his crop output and result in more income. Jimmy believes that the extra income he will get will change his life and increase his business

loans.use: To buy farm implements.

loans.name: Silvia Amparo

texts.es:
Silvia, a sus 33 años de edad, es una mujer carismática y servicial que se dedica a trabajar en su propio negocio, una tienda de abarrotes que inició por la necesidad de generar ingresos para sacar adelante a su familia. 

A pesar de las adversidades, ella tuvo la fortaleza y la determinación para levantarse y seguir adelante y, gracias a ello lleva 8 años de trayectoria en esta actividad.

Su propósito en la vida es seguir progresando y por ello desea fortalecer su negocio acreditándolo con la compra de surtido de productos como abarrotes, granos, frituras, bebidas gaseosas y en general productos básicos de la canasta familiar, de esta forma podrá ofrecer a sus clientes una mejor calidad y servicio, logrando aumentar notablemente sus ventas y los ingresos que recibe de ellas.

Silvia manifiesta que su mayor anhelo es seguir creciendo con su negocio y, en un futuro desea convertirlo en un supermercado, en el que los clientes puedan encontrar todos los artículos que necesiten y así mejorar la rentabilidad y poder ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.

Apoyando a este crédito estarás contribuyendo con el emprendimiento de las mujeres Colombianas!
texts.en:
Silvia at 33 years old is a charismatic and helpful woman who works in her own business, a grocery store that she started because of her need to generate income to support her family.

Despite the odds, she had the strength and determination to get up and move forward. As a result, she has 8 years of experience in her business activity. 
Her purpose in life is to keep progressing and, therefore, she wants to strengthen her business with a loan for the purchase of a range of products such as groceries, grains, fried foods, soft drinks, and general commodities for her store. She will be able to offer her customers better quality and service, significantly increasing her sales and the income she receives from them.

Silvia says that her greatest desire is to grow her business and in the future turn it into a supermarket where customers can find all the items they need. She wants to improve profitability and provide a better quality of life to her family.

Supporting this loan, you will be contributing to entrepreneurship in Colombian women!

loans.use: to stock her general store with groceries

loans.name: Salvador

texts.pt:
O senhor Salvador tem 64 anos de idade é casado e pai de 12 filhos 4 quaisja maioresos restantes 8 a estudarem vive na casa propria sustenta uma neta que vive com ele.
Com o valor do empréstimo irá comprar cimento, areia, pedra, varrões para a construção de sua casa.
Tem como projectos e sonhos terminar  a casa para dar um lar condigno a sua famίlia, adiquirir uma viatura e construir também uma mercearia num espaco que adiquiriu para o efeito.
Diz que os principais desafios que tem enfrentado sao os financeiros,  diz ter ja comecado a criar cabritos mas quer comecar a criar gado bovino e que ira solicitar mais emprestimos para concretizar seu plano.
texts.en:
Mr. Salvador is 64 years old, is married and the father of 12 children - 4 of whom are of age and the remaining 8 are in school. He lives in a house he owns and also supports a granddaughter who lives with him. 

With this loan he will buy cement, sand, stone and rods to build his house.

His dreams are to finish the construction work on his house so he can give his family a good home, buy a vehicle and also build a grocery store on a piece of land he acquired for this purpose.

He says his biggest challenges are financial ones. He says he's already started raising goats but wants to start raising cattle and will solicit further loans to fulfil his plans.

loans.use: buy cement, sand, stone and rods to build his house

loans.name: Mariana

texts.pt:
A senhora Mariana de 34 anos de idade  é criadora e comerciante, mae solteira de  5 filhos todos a estudarem vive na casa propria.
O valor do empréstimo irá comprar pintos, racoes, vacinas, sacos de racao para criacao e depois revender.
Tem como projectos e sonhos  tornar se  uma grande empresaria,  construir também mais um aviário para criar frangos para refoçar  a renda familiar.
Diz que os principais desafios que tem enfrentado sao os financeiros, e que ira solicitar mais emprestimos para concretizar seu plano.
texts.en:
Mrs. Mariana is 34 years old and is a breeder and a merchant. She's a single mother of 5 children who are all in school and she lives in a house she owns.

This loan will be used to buy chicks, rations, vaccines and sacks of ration for resale.

Her dreams are to become a great entrepreneur, to build an aviary to raise hens and reinforce her family's income.
She says the main challenges she has faced are financial ones and she will solicit further loans in order to carry out her plans.

 de 34 anos de idade  é criadora e comerciante, mae solteira de  5 filhos todos a estudarem vive na casa propria.
O valor do empréstimo irá comprar pintos, racoes, vacinas, sacos de racao para criacao e depois revender.
Tem como projectos e sonhos  tornar se  uma grande empresaria,  construir também mais um aviário para criar frangos para refoçar  a renda familiar.
Diz que os principais desafios que tem enfrentado sao os financeiros, e que ira solicitar mais emprestimos para concretizar seu plano.

loans.use: to buy chicks, rations, vaccines and sacks of ration for resale

loans.name: Monrovia Group

texts.en:
Rahabu is a mother of three sons and three daughters, one of whom is at school and the rest are grown. She was born in the 1970's and for three years now, Rahabu has a business selling rice. She sells stock at wholesale prices, and she travels upcountry every two weeks, just for stock purchase and to resell to small traders. When Rahabu travels upcountry (where she buys rice stock), she normally carries women's clothes with her to sell them to village people. She is able to make a fair monthly profit.

This is her second loan from Tujijenge Tanzaniato, be apportioned among MONROVIA, a three-member group. The group members will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan. 

Rahabu used the previous loan, since repaid, to buy business stock. She managed to receive an extra income, which she used to cover school fees and home food expenses. 

Rahabu will use her new loan to buy bags of rice for her business. She dreams of opening a big food store.

loans.use: to buy bags of rice for her business.

loans.name: Shiela

texts.en:
Shiela is 31 years old, married, and has five children. She owns and manages a variety store within the local community. She aimed to make her business more profitable to help her husband in sustaining their necessities, and to finance the education of her children. 

Having inadequate capital, she would like to avail a loan of PHP 50,000 to buy more stock of rice, feed, frozen foods, fiesta gas, fertilizer, medicines, slippers, and other grocery items to sell. 

Despite challenges in life, she has the determination to improve her business as well as their status of living.

loans.use: to buy more stock of rice, feed, frozen foods, fiesta gas, fertilizer, medicines, slippers, and other grocery items

loans.name: Janet

texts.en:
Janet, is a 32-year-old  married woman, her husband is a farmer. 

She manages a load station which she sells load on their village to use in mobile phones to make calls. 

Due to lack of capital,  she would like to request 5,000 PHP to purchase items to use in mobile phones to make calls. She's hoping that her business will continue to improve and become more profitable.

loans.use: to purchase items to use in mobile phones.

loans.name: Macaria

texts.en:
Macaria, aged 36 years, is married and has seven children. 

She has been farming for eight years. She will use the Kiva loan to buy fertilizer and support labor costs during rice production. She needs to buy fertilizer in order to increase her production. 

With profits from her farming, she wishes to invest in her business so that in the future she can acquire machines and tractors that will enhance her farming capacity.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and support labor costs during rice production.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy more stock of bananas

loans.name: Phillis

texts.en:
Phillis has a tailoring shop in Kakamega town and has been in this business for the past 11 years. She is 30 years old, married and together with her spouse, she has been blessed with two children. She also supports three people in her family.

She plans to use this loan to buy more stock of tailoring materials such as textiles, threads and tailor chalks for use in her business. She will use the anticipated profits to pay school fees for her children. She will also buy a plot to build her own shop. 

She has repaid her previous loans well, and this will be her fifth loan from VisionFund Kenya. In future, Phillis hopes to have a wholesale shop for tailoring materials, educate her children and be successful.

loans.use: To buy more tailoring materials.

loans.name: Meriam

texts.en:
Meriam is a widow with two children.

She operates a snack-vending store to make a living. Aside from this, she also vends meals in addition to her snack offerings to earn extra income. For over  ten years of running the business, she has earned well to support the needs of her children and has been able to sustain it.  

She borrowed a loan from GDMPC to buy additional raw ingredients to prepare snacks to sell. She hopes to improve the business to ensure a better future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional raw ingredients to prepare snacks to sell.

loans.name: Wilme

texts.en:
Wilme is 47 years old and married. With six children, two of whom are in school, she works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a buy-and-sell tobacco in the Philippines and requested a PHP 30,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional tobacco leaves to sell.

Wilme has been in this business for 6 years. She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional tobacco leaves to sell

loans.name: Dolores Del Carmen

texts.es:
Dolores, ha tenido resultados positivos al invertir el crédito anterior en la venta de frutas y verduras, tales como estabilidad económica, nuevos clientes, la oportunidad de  ofrecer a su familia una mejor alimentación, vestuario y salud, además con las nuevas ganancias a iniciado a elaborar flores y cortinas para adornar las tumbas de los difuntos, con lo que obtendrá ingresos extras. 
Se ve en la necesidad de solicitar un nuevo crédito para comprar flores, alambre, papelería, frutas y verduras, mantendrá su negocio surtido para satisfacer las demandas de sus clientes y  mantenerse en el mercado, espera tener muy buenos resultados con dicha inversión.
texts.en:
Dolores has had positive results from investing her previous loan in selling fruits and vegetables. This has given her economic stability, new clients, and the opportunity to offer her family better nutrition, clothing, and health. Furthermore, with her new earnings, she has started selling flowers and screens for graves. This is providing her an extra income.
She needs to request a new loan to purchase flowers, wire, stationery, fruits and vegetables. She will keep her business stocked to satisfy her customers' demand and keep herself in the market. She hopes to have good results with this investment.

loans.use: to buy flowers, wire, stationery, fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Antonio Jose

texts.es:
Antonio es un electricista de 60 años de edad un hombre de vereda con un trabajo que pocas veces se encuentra ya que por lo general todos se dedican a la agricultura pro lo que su trabajo en su sector se podría presumir que es único y necesario para su vereda. 
Tiene una vasta experiencia arreglando todo tipo de electrodomésticos comunes en la vereda como televisores, fogones, neveras, radios que son lo más común. 
Aunque es un electricista no se olvida de sus raíces campesinas y en su casa también tiene un criadero de pollos, actividad que complementa sus ingresos y es con esto que puede llevar el sustento a su familia, apoyar a su esposa y 3 hijos que hoy por hoy son mayores de edad.
Solicita un crédito para la compra de materiales para realizar las reparaciones como soldadores, medidores de voltaje, destornilladores y un poco del capital pedido será para la compra de pollos para su criadero. 
Con este crédito podrá seguir realizando reparaciones pues está consciente que la tecnología avanza y tiene que estar preparado para cualquier reparación pues de eso vive.
texts.en:
Antonio is a 60-year-old electrician, a job which is rare in his location because most people work in agriculture. For this reason, he is the only electrician in the area and his work is very necessary.
He has vast experience repairing all kinds of common home electronics such as televisions, stoves, fridges, and radios.
Even though he is an electrician, he has not forgotten his country roots. In his home, he also raises chickens to provide an extra income. Through this, he is able to support his family: his wife and three children who are now grown.
He is requesting a loan for the purchase of materials to make repairs, such as welding machines, voltage regulators, screwdrivers, and also to buy some chickens to raise.
With this loan he will be able to continue repairing electronics. He knows that technology is advancing and he has to be prepared for whatever repair, since this is how he makes a living.

loans.use: to buy welding machines, voltage regulators, and screwdrivers to repair electronics.

loans.name: José Antonio

texts.es:
José de 28 años de edad, está acompañado y tiene 1 hijo de tres años de edad, se dedica a la agricultura ya que es una actividad familiar.
 
Lo que planea hacer con este nuevo financiamiento es fortalecer sus cultivos, implementará un sistema de cultivo de ejote.
Con su crédito anterior obtuvo grandes ganancias y fortalecimientos de los cultivos, además un amplio conocimiento para futuros cultivos y también nuevos clientes que tienen una alta demanda de sus verduras que cultiva.
Sus siembras anteriores han fortalecido su negocio y generado mayores ganancias para su familia.
texts.en:
José, 28, is married and has a three-year-old son. He is a farmer and it is a family activity.

What he plans to do with his loan is to strengthen his crops, implementing a system of green bean cultivation.

With his previous loan, he earned big profits and crop yields. Plus he has extensive knowledge for future crops and new customers who have a high demand for the vegetables he grows.

His previous crops have strengthened his business and generated higher profits for his family.

loans.use: to grow green beans

loans.name: Fatima

texts.pt:
A senhora Fatima de 42 anos de idade é comerciante, casado pai  de 5 filhos 1 a estudar os restantes ja maioresl vive na casa própria sustenta um sobrinho que vive com ela.
Com valor do empréstimo irá comprar sabao, oleo, massas, farinha para reforcar o seu negocio que e feito em casa. 
Tem como projectos e sonhos terminar  a sua obra,  mobilar e fazer murro de vedacao de seu quintal.
Diz que os principais desafios que tem enfrentado sao os financeiros, e  que irá solicitar mais empréstimos para concretizar seu plano.
texts.en:
Mrs. Fatima is 42 years old, a trader, married and the mother of 5 children - 1 of whom is in school and the others are already of age. She lives in a house she owns and supports a nephew who lives with her.

With this loan she will buy soap, oil, pasta and flour to reinforce her business, which she runs from her home.

Her dreams are to finish building her house, furnish it and to build a wall around her garden.
She says her main challenges have been financial ones and she will solicit further loans in order to carry out her plans.

loans.use: buy soap, oil, pasta and flour to reinforce her business

loans.name: Azarias

texts.pt:
O senhor Azarias 53 anos de idade é electrecista numa empresa agricola da zona onde vive, casado e pai de 7 filhos 5 a estudarem vive na casa propria sustenta um sobrinho e um neto que vive com ele.
O valor do empréstimo irá comprar cimento, areia, pedra, varrões  e portao para a construção de um murro de vedacao de sua casa.
Tem como projectos e sonhos terminar  o muro de vedacao e adiquirir uma viatura para uso familiar.
Diz que os principais desafios que tem enfrentado sao os financeiros para a conclusao de sua casa, e que ira solicitar mais emprestimos para concretizar seu plano.
texts.en:
Mr. Azarias is 53 years old and is an electrician at an agricultural company in the area where he lives. He is married, the father of 7 children - 5 of whom are in school, lives in a house he owns and also supports a nephew and a grandson who live with him.

With this loan he will buy cement, sand, stone, rods and a gate to build a wall around his house.

His dreams are to finish building this wall and buy a vehicle for family use.
He says his main challenges have been financial ones as well as completing the construction work on his house and he will solicit further loans in order to carry out his plans.

loans.use: buy cement, sand, stone, rods and a gate to build a wall around his house

loans.name: Elenita

texts.en:
Due to hardship of living, Elenita aimed to improve her small retail store to earn sufficient income. She is 39 years old and blessed with six children. 

She wants to increase her product offerings and satisfy her customers' demand but she doesn't have enough capital. For this reason, she would like to access financial assistance from Kiva lenders amounting to PHP 17,000 to buy more stocks of groceries, fruits, and vegetables to resell. 

She is hoping that she will avail her loan request to be able to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of groceries, fruits, and vegetables to resell

loans.name: Agustina

texts.en:
Agustina is 27 years old and married. She has two children and they live happily in a rural community. She cares for her children and sells vegetables to generate income. 

She would to borrow 12,000.00 PHP to buy tomatoes, eggplant, okra, peppers, bitter melons, beans and squash to resell. 

She is a kind and diligent mother who believes that  she will make her business more profitable.

loans.use: to buy tomatoes, eggplant, okra, peppers, bitter melons, beans and squash.

loans.name: Theodora

texts.en:
Theodora has operated a veterinary sales business for 5 years. She sells seed, fertilizer, pesticides, and animal feed. Her monthly income is 40,000 KES.

She will  use this loan to buy veterinary products. These include pesticides, fertilizer, and seeds. She will use the anticipated profits to increase her inventory.

This is her third loan term with VisionFund Kenya having paid her previous loans successfully. In future Theodora hopes to succeed in her business and become a veterinary supplier, make more income and be able to educate her children and provide for her family.

She is 37 years old, married and is blessed with 3 children.

loans.use: to purchase veterinary products.

loans.name: Ben

texts.en:
Ben is a single man who describes himself as honest and kind. 

He sells charcoal and will use the 20,000 KES loan to buy  charcoal. His business goal is to enlarge business and open other  businesses within 5 years. 

He will use the anticipated profits to open another business.

loans.use: to buy charcoal.

loans.name: Arlene

texts.en:
Arlene works hard to support her family. She is married and has sold vegetables for 9 years.

She requests 30,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase additional vegetables to sell.

In the future, Arlene would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Sona

texts.en:
Sona lives in Masis town with her son. Sona's husband is a migrant worker in a neighbouring country who works hard and supports his family financially.
 
To tackle financial difficulties, Sona, since 2006, has been trading women’s clothing and shoes from a rented shop in one of the Masis town's markets. 
The assortment of clothing she sells in the store is not that big and needs to be updated and expanded periodically in order for her small business to be productive and competitive. 

She has requested this loan of USD 3,000 to purchase new stock of clothing.
 
She has taken a loan from local financial institutions before, but because of very difficult financial conditions, wasn't able to pay it back on time. Now, by ensuring that her retail business is successful and she is able to provide monthly payments for this loan, Sona has been approved for this loan within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF international. The second chance loan program provides loans to people who have a bad credit history and have no access to credit products.

loans.use: to pay for a new stock of clothing for selling in the store.

loans.name: Jose Delfin

texts.es: Jose Delfin, tiene la edad  de 58 años, está casado, vive con su hijo y esposa, los cuales son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de algunos fertilizantes que requiere para darle una mejor asistencia al cultivo de café, y aplicar los productos en el momento mas adecuado,  además de pagar mano de obra en trabajos en el terreno cultivado como lo son canales a nivel para evitar la erosión del suelo por la lluvia, con la realización de estas labores culturales espera tener un cultivo con un buen desarrollo y de antemano una cosecha adecuada. Con esta compra de productos adecuados tendrá una calidad mejor de producto para el consumidor. Es el primer  préstamo que  ha recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Jose Delfin is 58, married, and lives with his child and wife who are his greatest priority. With his loan, he will buy some fertilizer to better grow his coffee crops. He will apply the fertilizer at the best moment. He will also pay the labourers to work on the land and the canals in order to avoid soil erosion from the rain. Through this work, he hopes to have a good crop. With this purchase he will have a greater quality of products for the consumer. This is his first loan from FUDECOSUR. He has not had loans before from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has offered him a loan with greater ease and much lower interest rates.

loans.use: to plant coffee.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.en:
Teresa is 48 years old and married. With five children, one of whom is in school, she works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a buy-and-sell nipa roofing in the Philippines and requested a PHP 50,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional bundles of nipa to sell.

Teresa has been in this business for 15 years. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional bundles of nipa to sell

loans.name: Denis Noe Antonio

texts.es:
Denis es un joven emprendedor que tiene mucha habilidad para el comercio de ganado y granos básicos, tiene 26 años de edad,  actualmente está acompañado con una joven que también gusta de este mismo negocio pero dedica la mayor parte de su tiempo a actividades domésticas.

Denis tiene cerca de catorce años de estar realizando actividades de comercio de animales y granos básicos ya que desde muy pequeño comenzó a manejar el negocio en las plazas de su pueblo.

Él necesita el crédito para comprar más ganado y granos para seguir con sus actividades de comerciante  y  así crecer y optar por ampliar su inventario de animales e insumos para vender.

El planea ser un gran negociante y de esta forma salir adelante en la vida, es por eso que necesita ayuda a través de este crédito.
texts.en:
Denis is a young entrepreneur who is very capable in working with livestock and selling basic grains. He is 26 and has a girlfriend who is in the same business but mainly does housework.
Denis has been working in livestock and agriculture for about 14 years. He started working in the local plazas at a very young age.
He needs a loan to purchase more livestock and grains to continue with his business and expand it. He needs to expand his animal inventory and supplies.
He plans to be a great businessman and succeed in life. This is why he needs help from this loan.

loans.use: to buy more livestock and basic grains.

loans.name: Mullai Shg - Pattam Group

texts.en:
Anjammal is 28 years old and resides in Pattam, a small village in Tanjore District, Tamil Nadu, India. Anjammal is married and has three children; all of them are studying in elementary school. Her husband is a farmer and a laborer in agriculture fields, but now is unable to sustain his family with his income alone.
 
Anjammal is the featured borrower of the 12-member Mullai Self-Help Group (SHG). The group has been receiving loans from the local NGO “People’s Action for Transformation” (PAT) for the last six years.             

Anjammal and her group would like to take a Kiva loan to purchase a Greenway smart smokeless stove. Each group member is requesting a small loan of INR 1,400, which will be repaid in easy installments. The Greenway smart stove is a single burner, high-efficiency cook-stove designed for long-term, everyday use. The stove can use any type of solid biomass fuel including wood, cow dung and agricultural waste. It also produces 70% less smoke while using 65% less fuel than traditional mud cook-stoves.  
    
Anjammal and her group have the opportunity to save time and cut a recurring fuel expense, all while being able to cook in a healthier environment. This stove has also been tested and certified by the Ministry of New & Renewable Energy (MNRE), Government of India.

loans.use: to buy a smokeless stove

loans.name: Tony Alberto

texts.es:
Tony es un joven de 19 años de edad que estudió hasta noveno grado, no continuó estudiando debido a que tenía que trabajar, está soltero y vive junto a sus padres y 3 hermanas menores.

Tony se dedica a la agricultura, él siembra hortalizas, es un trabajo familiar que ha venido durante años y lo han desarrollado y mantenido hasta el momento porque es una actividad que le generan buenos ingresos económicos para su familia, aparte de dedicarse a esta actividad también trabaja de jornalero. Sus cultivos le quedan a una distancia de 2 kilómetros aproximadamente y tiene que caminar desde su casa hasta el lugar de trabajo. 	

Él necesita el crédito para invertir en la siembra de ejotes, comprará fertilizantes, abono y pagará mano de obra. 


Sus planes son construir su propia casa, seguir estudiando y formar su propia familia, también le gustaría tener más variedad de verduras y lograr  ser un exportador en grande hacia otros mercados.
texts.en:
Tony is a young 19-year-old who studied until grade 9. He did not continue because he had to work. He is single and lives with his parents and three younger siblings.
Tony works in agriculture. He plants vegetables. This is a family work that they've been doing for years and years because it makes them a good income. Tony also works as a day labourer. His land is located approximately 2 kilometres from his home and he walks there.
He needs a loan to invest in the purchase of green beans. He will purchase fertilizer and manure and pay the labourers.
He plans to build his own home, to keep studying, and to start his own family. He would also like to have a greater variety of vegetables and become a large-scale exporter to other markets.

loans.use: to invest in planting green beans by buying fertilizer and manure, and to pay the labourers.

loans.name: Ilqar

texts.en:
Ilqar is 53 years old and married with three kids. Ilqar has always worked in agriculture, growing fruits and vegetables. The work is going very well as Ilqar has many years' experience, and because he always worries about giving his customers the highest quality products. But he has a problem with water  because every time, he must get water from a neighbor. For this reason, he is asking for a loan of 1,000 AZN (Azerbaijani New Manat) so that he can obtain a water pump to irrigate and expand his crops.

He is very grateful to Kiva lenders, because thanks to their support, he will be able to buy a water pump.

loans.use: to buy a water pump to irrigate his crops

loans.name: Makoka Group

texts.en:
Maimuna is a widow woman who is aged in her early sixties and has five children, of whom only two are at school. She has been a hairstylist in her own beauty salon for four years now. Working from 9 a.m. to 10 p.m. daily, she is able to make a fair monthly profit.

From Tujijenge Tanzania, this is her third credit request, which she will use to buy hair salon products. With the previous two credits, all of which were paid back successfully, she bought salon equipment. She is now happier since her business is able to meet more customers' needs instead of getting them met from other shops. She received some profit, which she used to cover household expenses and school fees. Maimuna dreams to build a house.

She will share this loan with her loan group, "MAKOKA," which consist of three people. The group members will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy hair salon products.

loans.name: Orlando

texts.pt:
O senhor Orlando de 58 anos de idade é militar, casado e pai de 7 filhos todos a estudarem vive na casa propria sustenta um sobrinho que vive com ele.
O valor do empréstimo irá comprar cimento, areia, pedra, varrões para a construção de sua casa.
Tem como projectos e sonhos terminar  a casa para dar um lar condigno a sua famίlia e depois da casa construir também uma barraca para refoçar  a renda familiar.
Diz que os principais desafios que tem enfrentado sao os financeiros para a conclusao de sua casa, e que ira solicitar mais emprestimos para concretizar seu plano.
texts.en:
Mr. Orlando is 58 years old, in the military and the married father of 7 children who are all in school. He lives in a house he owns and also supports a nephew who lives with him.

With this loan he will buy cement, sand, stone and rods to carry out construction work on his house.

His dreams are to finish building the house and provide a good home for his family and then to build a stand to reinforce his family's income.
He says his main challenges have been financial ones as well as completing his house and he will solicit further loans in order to carry out his plans.

loans.use: buy cement, sand, stone and rods to carry out construction work on his house

loans.name: Macario

texts.pt:
O senhor Macario e membro da policia, casado pai  de 7 filhos dos quais 4 a estudarem , vive na casa própria sustenta um neto que vive com ele.
Com valor do empréstimo irá comprar cimento, areia, pedra, varrões para a construção de sua casa de banho e vedar seu quintal com murro de vedacao.
Tem como projectos e sonhos terminar  a sua obra e  murro de vedacao de seu quintal e adiquirir uma motobomba para usar na sua machamba.
Diz que os principais desafios que tem enfrentado sao os financeiros,  que nos seus tempos livres cuida da sua machamba e  que irá solicitar mais empréstimos para concretizar seu plano.
texts.en:
Mr. Macario is a member of the police force and a married father of 7 children, 4 of whom are in school. He lives in a house he owns and supports a grandson who lives with him.

With this loan he will buy cement, sand, stone and rods to build a bathroom and a wall around his yard.

His projects are to finish building the wall around his yard and to buy a pump to use on his small farmland.

He says his main challenges have been financial ones, that in his spare time he works on his farm and that he will solicit further loans in order to carry out his plans.

loans.use: buy cement, sand, stone and rods to build a bathroom and a wall around his yard

loans.name: Tutiniso

texts.ru: Тутинисо добрая женщина. Она родилась в 1972 году. Тутинисо замужем и имеет 2 детей. Она всегда заботится об обучении своих детей. Тутинисо обратилась за займом для оплаты учебы своей дочери, так как ее дочь Мавлуда в этом году с отличием окончила среднюю школу и поступила в Худжандский Государственный Университет. Теперь Мавлуда студентка 1 курса по специальности библиотекарь. Она обещала маме окончить университет с отличными оценками. Тутинисо запрашивает займ для оплаты учебного договора дочери. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Tutiniso is a kind woman. She was born in 1972. Tutiniso is married and has two children. She always worries about her children's education. Tutiniso applied for a loan for her daughter's education, as her daughter, Mavluda, graduated secondary school with top marks and enrolled in Khujand State University. Now Mavluda is a first-year student in the Librarian Studies Department. Mavluda promised her mother to graduate from university with top marks. Tutiniso is requesting a loan to pay for her daughter's university tuition. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to pay for her daughter's university tuition.

loans.name: Micheal

texts.en:
Micheal has run a clothing  business  for 4 years. He is a 21-year-old married man and supports his parents and two children. 

He will use this loan to buy clothing to sell. This will enable him to generate more income which he will use to increase his inventory.

This is Micheal's first loan  with VisionFund Kenya and he hopes to expand his business, earn more income, provide for the needs of his family and live a good life.

loans.use: to buy more clothes for sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy maize and ingredients to prepare food.

loans.name: Priscah

texts.en:
Priscah is a married woman. She has five children. She describes herself to be ambitious. She operates a retail business where she sells flour, rice and other items. She has been involved in this business for four years. Her business is located in a good area, and her primary customers are individuals. She describes her biggest business challenge to be lack of finances. 

She will use the 10,000 Kenyan shillings loan to buy more stock of flour and other foodstuffs. Her business goal is to expand within five years. She hopes that in the future, she will be successful in business. This is her first loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank.

loans.use: to buy more stock of flour and other foodstuffs

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy more stock of bananas

loans.name: Arlene

texts.en:
Arlene has 1 child and  operates a farm to make a living. 

For over fifteen years, she has earned enough to provide for  the family. She plans to improve the farm in order to send her child to school for a better education. 

She requests a new loan from GDMPC micro credit to buy seedlings and organic fertilizer. In the future she wants to provide a good education for her child and improve the family's standard of living.

loans.use: to buy seedlings and organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Neneth

texts.en:
Neneth works hard to support her family. She is married and has a buy-and-sell coconut wine business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for ten years now.

She requested a PHP 23,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional gallons of coconut wine to sell. In the future, Neneth would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional gallons of coconut wine to sell

loans.name: Bintihamisi

texts.en:
Bintihamisi operates a business selling paraffin, selling at the market to her neighbors and passersby. She appreciates the support of the previous loan which helped her to boost her stock. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her business.   

With the 50,000 KES, Bintihamisi wants to purchase seven gallons of paraffin for sale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase seven gallons of paraffin for sale

loans.name: Alice

texts.en:
Alice is a married mother of one child, who is in school. She lives in her own house that has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food.

For the past 5 years, Alice has operated a clothes-selling business, selling from door-to-door to her neighbors and passersby. She faces a major challenge of high cost of transportation. She dreams of expanding and establishing a boutique business in the future. 

With the loan that she is requesting of 10,000 KES, Alice wants to purchase bales of clothes for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bales of clothes for resale

loans.name: Juan Antonio

texts.es:
Juan de 31 años de edad, vive con su madre y el resto de hermanos y demás familia, se dedica a la agricultura y trabaja ocasionalmente como albañil entre otras cosas.
Habiendo nacido en el campo, él tiene una gran capacidad y experiencia en las actividades que realiza ya que toda su vida la ha pasado en el mismo lugar, siempre cosecha buenos cultivos y en la comunidad lo buscan para realizar diferentes trabajos de albañilería. 
Juan solicita el crédito para comprar materiales de construcción y hacer mejoras en casa de su familia.

En un futuro él planea mejorar la casa de su familia y cosechar buenos cultivos, una vez hecho eso comprará su propio terreno para construir su propia casa.
texts.en:
Juan, age 31, lives with his mother and siblings and other family members. He works in agriculture and sometimes as a bricklayer and in other miscellaneous areas.
Being born in the country, he has great abilities and experience in farming, as he has spent his whole life in the same place. He always harvests good crops and the community seeks him out for bricklaying work. Juan is requesting this loan to purchase construction materials and improve his family home. 
In the future he plans to improve the family home and harvest good crops. Once this is done, he will buy his own plot of land to build his own house.

loans.use: to buy construction materials and to make repairs to his family home.

loans.name: Rodolfo

texts.es:
Rodolfo es un hombre de 61 años de edad, casado, tiene 2 hijos y su trabajo es la construcción.
Él es emprendedor, Buen padre, Alegre, optimista, feliz, de buena actitud, comprometido, generoso, amable, responsable y muy trabajador. Su trabajo lo realiza en Sacaba que es la capital de la provincia del Chapare, y es la segunda ciudad grande en población del departamento de Cochabamba, su clima es templado, durante el invierno las temperaturas son de 1 grado centígrado a 24 grados.
Rodolfo es de tez morena, estatura mediana, su lengua natal es el quechua que lo combina con español según sus necesidades. Su trabajo es la construcción, él se dedica a la obra fina, realiza los acabados de paredes; planchado, pintado de interiores y exteriores, instalación de contrapiso, colocación de cerámica, colocado de puertas, marcos, ventanas, etc. El sueño de su vida es ver terminada la construcción de su casa, para que sus nietos (que están a su cargo) vivan en mejores condiciones.
Es por esos motivos que Rodolfo solicita un préstamo para la instalación de agua en su casa para mejorar la calidad de vida de sus nietos.
texts.en:
Rodolfo is a 61-year-old man who is married and has two children. He works in construction.
He is an entrepreneur, a good father, happy, optimistic, joyful, has a good attitude, shares, is generous, kind, responsible, and very hard-working. He works in Sacaba, the capital of the Chapare province. Sacaba is the second-largest city in terms of population in the Cochabamba department. The climate is temperate. In the winters, the temperature ranges between 1 degree celcius to 24 degrees.
Rodolfo has dark hair, is of medium build, and his native language is Quechua. He uses Spanish when necessary. He works in construction. He makes fine works, finishes walls, sands walls down and paints interior and exterior walls. He installs flooring and tiles, doors, windows, etc. His life dream is to finish building his home so that his grandchildren, who are in his care, can live in better conditions.
For this reason, Rodolfo is requesting a loan to install water in his home in order to improve his grandchildren's quality of life.

loans.use: to install water in his home to improve his grandchildren's quality of life.

loans.name: Randy

texts.en:
Randy is a responsible father who is raising his family in a rural community. He is 41 years old and has two schooling children. Despite the hardship of living, he aimed to improve their status of living and educate his children. 

Aside from farming, Randy also engages in making and selling snack foods within his community to earn additional income. He aimed to continue and improve this business but he has limited capital. For this reason, he would like to avail a loan of 12,000 PHP to buy the needed ingredients for making taho and ice candy salad (refreshment foods) to sell. Through patience and hard work, Randy believes that someday he will make his business more profitable.

loans.use: to buy the needed ingredients for making taho and ice candy to sell

loans.name: Hangoma

texts.ru: Хангома родилась в 1991 году. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 2 несовершеннолетних детей. Она после окончания средней школы не имела возможности поступить в университет. Она пошла к портнихе и научилась шитью женской одежды. Хангома уже более 4 года предоставляет услуги швеи. Она шьет как национальные, так и европейские стили одежды. Хангома данное время нуждается финансовой поддержке, так как она серьёзно больна, и ей срочно надо лечиться. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 3000 сомони для покупки лекарства для лечения. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Hangoma was born in 1991. She is married and has two young children. After graduating from secondary school, she did not have the opportunity to attend university. She went to a seamstress and learned how to sew women's clothing. Hangoma has been offering her services as a seamstress for four years already. She sews both ethnic Tajik-style and European-style clothing. Hangoma currently needs financial assistance as she is seriously ill and needs treatment as soon as possible. She is requesting a loan for 3000 somoni to buy medicine needed for her treatment. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to buy medicine for her treatment.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase bananas

loans.name: Sheillah

texts.en:
Sheillah is 28 years old, married and, together with her spouse, has been blessed with five children. She has a hotel (restaurant) business which she has been running for the past two years now and she makes a monthly income of KES 10,000. 

She will use this loan to buy more stock of maize and wheat flour, beans, cooking oil, and sugar. She will use the anticipated profits to provide for the basic needs of her family.

This is her second loan term from VisionFund Kenya and she repaid her previous loan successfully. In future she hopes to grow her business and educate her children.

loans.use: To buy cooking oil, sugar, rice, and maize flour.

loans.name: Mimi

texts.en:
Mimi is 50 years old and single. She works very hard to help her parents.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc.

Mimi has been in this business for ten years. In the future, she would like to save enough to build a house for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc.

loans.name: Juan Antonio

texts.es:
Juan de 46 años de edad, es una persona responsable y trabajadora, él junto a sus hermanos han tenido que luchar para llevar ingresos económicos a su familia, creció junto a sus cuatro hermanos, tres hombres y una mujer, desde muy pequeño tuvo que trabajar duro para ayudar a sus otros hermanos, porque a temprana edad quedaron sin padres, así Juan tuvo que dejar por un lado sus estudios.


Desde temprana edad ha trabajado en la agricultura, aprendió esta actividad gracias a su tío que lo apoyó, además, trabaja como corralero en haciendas aledañas, donde se ha ganado la confianza y siempre es solicitado por sus servicios. 


Él necesita el crédito para comprar materiales de construcción, arena, cemento y grava para mejorar su casa, ya que es de adobe y con la lluvia se está deteriorando, con esto podrá comenzar a mejorar su vivienda, ya que se encuentra en mal estado y necesita reparación. 

Su sueño es contar con su propio terreno donde cultivar, ya que cada año tiene que alquilar y eso le genera costos.
texts.en:
Juan, age 46, is a very responsible and hard-working person. He and his siblings have had to work hard to bring in an income for their family. He grew up with his four siblings: three boys and a girl. From a very young age he had to work hard to help his siblings, because they were orphaned at a young age. Juan had to leave his studies because of this.
From a young age, he has worked in agriculture. He learned this work thanks to his uncle, who supported him. He has also worked as a cooper on more far-away farms. He has gained confidence and is always sought-out for his services.
He needs this loan to purchase construction materials, sand, cement and gravel to improve his home. It is currently made of adobe and it is deteriorating in the rain. With this, he will be able to start to improve his home; it is in bad shape and needs repairs.
His dream is to have his own land to cultivate, since he has to rent every year and this is an expense.

loans.use: to buy construction materials, sand, cement and gravel to repair his house.

loans.name: Argelia

texts.es: Argelia, tiene la edad  de 26 años, está soltera, vive con sus padres y  un hermano, que son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de una novilla para cría, ella pretende que su negocio crezca poco a poco. Con esto poder generar mas ganancias y poder brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Élla no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Argelia is 26, single, and lives with her parents and one sibling. Her family is her main priority. With her loan, she will buy a heifer to raise. She hopes her business will grow bit by bit. With this, she will be able to generate a greater income and offer her family a greater quality of life. This is her first loan from FUDECOSUR. She has not had other loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has offered her this loan with greater ease and much lower interest rates.

loans.use: to buy livestock to raise.

loans.name: Gerald

texts.en: Hello world, meet Gerald, a 46-year-old farmer from Kerugoya, Kenya. Gerald is a husband and the father of one kid. He has been a mixed farmer for 13 years. His primary income sources are milk, eggs and tea. He enjoys milking. Gerald’s biggest challenge over the years, however, is watering his plants. The annual rainfall patterns in Kerugoya are not very favorable in certain seasons for crop farmers. Gerald is seeking a loan to purchase poultry. He is trying to grow other product categories to spread the risks to which he is currently exposed. By expanding his poultry farm, he will be less reliant on other products for survival. This will also enable Gerald to earn extra income to pay his highest monthly expense - school fees. With your loan, Gerald will ensure he makes use of the opportunity to impact his family's living standards positively.

loans.use: To purchase additional poultry

loans.name: Lucía Esperanza

texts.es:
Lucia de 39 años de edad, actualmente vive con sus 3 hijos que se encuentran estudiando.

Lucía  es una mujer luchadora que se dedica a realizar ventas variables para poder solventar un poco sus necesidades ya que todos sus hijos estudian y todo esto le origina múltiples gastos, para lo cual también realiza oficios domésticos en otras casas.
Ella necesita el crédito para comprar materiales de construcción y pagar mano de obra para mejorar su vivienda ya que algunas partes están deterioradas.
Lucia planea para un futuro tener su pequeña casa completamente terminada y poder construir un mini-chalet que le genere ingresos para que sus hijos se formen como profesionales.
texts.en:
Lucia, age 39, currently lives with her three children, and they go to school.  Lucia is a tenacious woman.  She sells various items in order to be able to pay for a few necessities.  This is because all of her children go to school, and all of this generates multiple expenses.  She also does domestic chores in other houses.

She needs the loan to buy construction materials and to pay for the labor to improve her house.  Parts of the house have deteriorated.

In the future Lucia plans to have her small house completely finished.  She also plans to be able to build a mini-market that will generate income so that her children are trained as professionals.

loans.use: to buy construction materials and to pay for the labor to improve her house.

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Meet Ali. He runs a small stall that sells snacks, drinks and mobile phone airtime credits. Ali lives with his wife and their only child in Jakarta, the capital city of Indonesia. He was introduced to Ruma by one of Ruma's staff members who visited his stall, and he quickly became interested to join Ruma about a month ago. 

As the business continues to grow, he hopes to get a working capital loan from Kiva to enable him to process more airtime sales on the weekends. He also hopes that he would be able to improve his business, as he learned from Ruma. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To process more mobile airtime sales on the weekends and provide mobile services in his community

loans.name: Yeyet

texts.en: Yeyet, her husband, and 3 other family members live together in East Bandung, a regency area in West Java. Her husband works in a private company. To support family living, Yeyet manages a small shop that sells snacks, drinks, and mobile phone airtime credits. She joined Ruma about a month ago because she wanted to increase her family’s income. She also wants to expand her network, learn how to use technology and learn how to run her small stall more effectively. She feels really excited to expand her business in selling mobile phone airtime credits. As the business runs, she hopes to get a working capital loan from Kiva in order to provide more airtime transactions in her community on weekends. Yeyet thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To provide mobile services to her community

loans.name: Mashurakhon

texts.en:
Mashurakhon was born in 1975 year. She is a kind and hardworking woman. She is married and has four children. 

She cares for the children with her efforts alone because her husband is a migrant in Russia. Mashurakhon’s elder child is 16 years old and he studies at the private lyceum. He studies well and dreams after graduating from the lyceum to apply to the Economic University and to be a higher educated person. 

Mashurakhon is going to pay the tuition of her son in the lyceum and with this aim she is asking for a loan. She awaits your support.

loans.use: to pay for her child's education at the lyceum

loans.name: Juhudi - Ndege Group

texts.en:
Vailet, who is in her mid 30's, is married with five children. Two of them are grown up and three are still at school.  She has been running a business of selling second-hand clothes for four years now.  She works from 7 AM to 8 PM daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be Vailet's first loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  She will use this loan to increase the second-hand clothes stock.  She dreams of building a house. 

Vailet will share this loan with her loan group, Juhudi-Ndege, which consists of ten members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to increase the second-hand clothes stock.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.en:
Margarita is 54 years old and married, with three children, one of whom is in school. She works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase stocks to sell like canned goods, eggs, milk, soap, etc.

Margarita has been in this business for 10 years.  She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase stocks to sell like canned goods, eggs, milk, soap, etc.

loans.name: Pedro Julio

texts.es:
Pedro ha podido acumular grandes experiencias gratas en su vida, una de ellas es el haber podido trabajar en diferentes tiendas de abarrotes en el municipio de Medellín.

Es un padre amoroso y responsable y tiene muy presente el significado de la familia en su proceso productivo.

El siempre fue muy inquieto y con gran vocación de servicio, cualidades que lo motivaron para iniciar con su propia tienda de abarrotes y hacerla muy reconocida en el sector.

Hoy en día es un hombre amable y muy emprendedor, siempre buscando alternativas para que sus clientes se sientan bien atendidos y comprando productos de calidad.

El solicita un préstamo para la compra de surtido de productos de la canasta familiar pues planea aumentar su oferta de productos y desea tener un inventario mucho más grande, así podrá tener los productos disponibles para sus clientes. 

Su mayor sueño es poder tener una gran distribuidora de víveres, considera que poco a poco puede lograrlo.
texts.en:
Pedro has been able to accumulate many pleasing experiences in his life and one of them is to have worked in different grocery stores in the municipality of Medellín. He is a loving and responsible father who keeps in mind the meaning of family in his work process. He has always been very restless and has a great capacity for service, qualities that motivated him to open his own grocery store and make himself known in the area.

Today he is a friendly and very enterprising man always on the look-out for ways to make his clients feel cared for and buying quality products. He is requesting a loan to buy a variety of basic food items. He plans to increase his offering of products and wants to have a much larger inventory and be able to have the products available for his customers. His main dream is to be a large distributor of food and he thinks he can do it little by little.

loans.use: to buy a variety of basic food items to stock his store.

loans.name: Dyeness

texts.en:
Dyeness is married and has two children, who attend school. She operates a tea leaves business, selling at the market to her neighbors and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her business.  

Dyeness requested a loan from Yehu for 10,000 KES, which she will use to purchase five sacks of tea leaves for sale to her clients. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water.  Dyeness's dream is to establish a wholesale business of selling tea leaves in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase five sacks of tea leaves to sell

loans.name: Flor María

texts.es:
Flor de 36 años de edad, es una persona muy trabajadora, actualmente vive con su compañero de vida quien por prestar sus servicio como empleado está pensionado, y aún no han procreado hijos.

Flor vendía atol chuco, poleadas y palomitas de maíz, pero hoy esta vendiendo pupusas de diversos tipos, ya que le han proporcionado un espacio para que pueda vender en la escuela de su comunidad y así poder ayudar a los alumnos que no desayunan en sus casas.


Con el préstamo se le estará ayudando, para que pueda comprar materia prima para elaborar distintos tipos de pupusas, comprará ayote , loroco, frijol y queso.


Flor sueña tener un negocio muy fuerte a corto plazo.
texts.en:
