Flor is 36 years old and is a very hard working person. She lives with her life companion who has a pension for his work as an employee. They do not have any children yet. Flor sells atole chuco ( a corn drink that is darker than normal atole), poleada (a type of porridge) and popcorn.

But now she is selling a variety of pupusas. She has been given a space in the local school to sell so she can help the children who have no had breakfast in their homes. The loan will help her as she can buy raw materials to make the different types of pupusas buying squash, locoro, beans and cheese. Flor dreams of having a very strong business in the short term.

loans.use: to buy raw materials to make different types of pupusas buying squash, loroco (a vine with edible flowers), beans and cheese.

loans.name: Ismatullo

texts.ru: Исматулло живет с родителями на юге страны. Он порядочный и честный молодой человек. Исматулло в этом году успешно окончил среднюю школу и поступил в Национальный Университет Таджикистана. Он учится на первом курсе по специальности банковское дело. Он должен оплатить за учебный договор первого курса, но его родители не в состоянии оплатить за его учебный договор. Поэтому он запрашивает займ для оплаты учебного договора. Он ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие. В будущем он мечтает стать высококвалифицированным специалистом.
texts.en: Ismatullo lives with his parents in the south of the country. He is a respectable and honest young man. This year, Ismatullo graduated from secondary school and enrolled in the National University of Tajikistan. He is a first-year student in the Banking Department. He needs to pay for his first-year tuition but his parents are not in the position to pay for his tuition. This is why he is requesting a loan to pay for his university tuition. He awaits your kindness and relies on your generosity. He dreams of becoming a highly-qualified specialist in the future.

loans.use: to pay for his university tuition.

loans.name: Gladis

texts.es:
Gladis una campesina muy amorosa y de gran pasión por la naturaleza, trabaja con animales pero no sacrificándolos ni vendiéndolos solamente trabaja con la leche de las vacas y es tanta la admiración y respeto por los animales que prefiere que mueran pro vejez antes de tener que sacrificarles para conseguir una rentabilidad por su carne. 
Es madre de 2 niñas de 9 y 4 años de edad trabaja con ellas enseñándoles la pasión por el campo por amar la naturaleza y el amor pro los animales. 
Pensando en su vivienda y en sus hijas la señora Gladis quiere expandirse y por tal motivo tiene un dinero juntado para comprar una vaca lechera pro lo que requiere un crédito para ajustar el dinero suficiente para comprar la vaca pues si abona un capital y queda debiendo el otro los interés serían muy altos y estaría pagando el doble de la vaca. 
Con la ayuda de esta vaca tendrá más producción lechera garantizando una vida económica estable para el futuro de ella y sus hijas. 
Sueña con tener una finca con muchas vacas rodearse de estos mamíferos que le ayudan a llevar el sustento a su familia.
texts.en:
Gladis is farmer who is very loving and passionate by nature.  She works with animals, not killing or selling them, but only working with dairy cows.  She has such an admiration and respect for animals that she would prefer that they die of old age rather than be killed for the profit of their meat.

Gladis is the mother of 2 daughters aged 9 and 4.  She works with them teaching them to be passionate about country life and nature, and to love animals.  Thinking of her daughters, Gladis wants to expand her house.  This is why she has saved some money to buy a dairy cow.  She needs a loan to make up the balance so that she can purchase the cow, because if she keeps her savings and borrows for the full amount the interest will be very high and she will effectively pay twice for the cow.

With the help of this cow, she will have more milk production, guaranteeing more financial stability in the future for herself and her daughters.  Gladis dreams of having a farm with many cows, surrounded by these mammals that help her to support her family.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Mario  Roberto

texts.es:
Mario es un joven de 24 años de edad, vive en la casa de su madre con su compañera de vida que se encuentra embarazada.
Mario tiene 6 años de trabajar en una empresa avícola y gracias a ese empleo ayuda en su casa con los gastos de alimentación, además se ha dedicado al cuido de especies menores y ha sido así como le ha gustado mucho su trabajo para desempeñarse de una forma más eficiente.

Él necesita el crédito para pagar una deuda que tiene pendiente en una institución financiera, y también para construir un pozo ya que no cuenta con agua potable.
Su sueño es tener una casa propia amueblada, grande y muy bonita para su familia.
texts.en:
Mario is a young man, 24 years of age, who lives in his mother's house with his life's companion who is currently pregnant.

Mario has worked for six years in a poultry enterprise and, thanks to this job, he is able to aid in paying for the costs of food in his home. In addition, he has dedicated himself to raising small livestock. Mario has enjoyed his work very much and wants to find ways to carry out these tasks more efficiently.

He needs this loan to pay off his debt with a financial institution and, also, to construct a well, since his family currently has no access to potable water.

Mario's dream is to have his own large and very pretty furnished house for his family.

loans.use: to pay off a pending debt and, also, to construct a well, since his family lacks potable water.

loans.name: Arvam Shg - Thittacheri Group

texts.en:
Durgadevi (the featured borrower is standing with her hand raised) leads the Arvam group with 12 other women residing in the Thittacheri village in Tanjore District of Tamil Nadu. Durgadevi is the featured borrower. They are all hardworking married women, and to support their family income and meet their monthly expenditure, they have to work. They are engaged in diverse occupations and either work as daily wage agricultural laborers, or as employees in small private firms, or they run their own small rural businesses. 

However, with their meager incomes, they still have some way to go in terms of improving their living conditions. For cooking, they mostly use the traditional chulhas, makeshift stoves that use firewood, which emits a lot of smoke. The smoke not only causes health problems among the family members, but also pollutes their surroundings.             

This 13-member group is seeking a loan to purchase 13 Greenway cooking stoves. The benefits of the Greenway stoves are fuel savings, using all solid fuels, minimized emissions of harmful carbon components, fast and convenient cooking, high durability, being maintenance free, and being smokeless. They intend to repay the loan amount in easy installments. This loan product will help them in preventing diseases, saving on firewood expenses, and promoting a clean environment.

loans.use: to buy a smokeless cook-stove

loans.name: Subudhi Shg Group

texts.en:
Sunita is the group leader of a 11-member group from a small village situated in the Koraput district of Odisha, India. Her family is comprised of four members: herself, her husband, and two children. The member seated in the middle of the first row is Sunita. 

At present, she has been running a general store with the help of her husband for the last six years. Sunita is a very active lady who wants some extra income with her own efforts. At present, her family income is INR 6,000 per month, which is not sufficient to maintain her family. 

To improve her living conditions and earn some extra income, she wants to take a loan. With her portion of this loan, she will purchase bath soaps, washing powder, bangles, vanity bags, money purses, deodorant spray, face creams, and some household items. 

It will be the first loan for this "Subudhi SHG" group from People's Forum. Sunita dreams of being a wholesaler of general household items in her locality. The other ten members of the group want loans for the development of their existing businesses such as grocery shop, betel shop, goat rearing, etc.

loans.use: to purchase bath soaps, washing powder, bangles, vanity bags, money purses, deodorant spray, face creams, and some other personal items.

loans.name: Sita Shg Group

texts.en:
The "Sita SHG," a newly formed group, is made up of women who want to bring change to their daily lives through the program. They all live in the same village and share values of solidarity and working together. They mainly run small businesses and do some crop cultivation. 

Janaki is the lady in the picture who is seated first on the right hand side, the featured borrower of the group. She is 45 years old and is a married mother of three children. She sells seasonal fruits and has perfectly mastered this business, having done it for more than twelve years. She sells fresh fruits like oranges, apples, bananas, pineapples, guavas, etc. 

With her new loan, she plans to buy fresh fruits in bulk to resell. With her profits, she plans to increase her savings so as to better establish her business. Other members of this group are engaged in different businesses like milk selling, fish selling, vegetable selling, etc.

loans.use: to purchase fresh fruits in bulk to resell.

loans.name: Thenral Shg - Ukkarai Group

texts.en:
Jayanthi is 43 years old and lives in her own house with her child and husband. Her husband is a daily wage worker. They live in a village, Ukkarai, in Tamil Nadu.

Jayanthi is leader of the Thenral Self Help Group, which is formed by a local NGO, People Action for Transformation (PAT), in Tamil Nadu. The NGO majorly works to improve the livelihood of the people in that region.   
  
Jayanthi and the other members are requesting a loan to purchase a smokeless stove, which emits very less smoke and is better than the traditional mud stove. The smokeless stove is designed for daily use and is more efficient and clean. It promotes healthier lifestyles by limiting the toxic and hazardous effects of indoor pollution.

loans.use: to buy a smokeless stove

loans.name: Hugo Cesar

texts.es: Hugo de 30 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida, el es mecánico dental de profesión desde hace varios años, tiene una pequeña clínica dental ubicada en su lugar de residencia, posee mucha clientela por su buen trabajo y los buenos precios, con  lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos que se le presentan en su hogar, Hugo está solicitando un crédito para poder comprar materiales e instrumentos que utiliza en su clínica como: pinzas, porcelana y resina para realizar prótesis dentales, etc. y así continuar con su trabajo que le genera buenas ganancias y poder tener una mejor calidad de vida junto con su compañera de vida.
texts.en:
Hugo is 30 years old and lives in his own house with his life companion. He is a dental technician by profession and has been working for several years. He has a small dental clinic located at his house. He has a large clientele because of his good work and good prices. He manages to pay some of the household expenses with what he earns.

Hugo is requesting a loan to be able to buy materials and instruments that he uses in his clinic like tweezers porcelain and resin to make dental prosthesis, etc. Then he can continue his work which generates good income and can have a better quality of living together with his life companion.

loans.use: to buy tweezers, porcelain and resin to make dental prosthesis.

loans.name: Ohm Sakthi Shg - Sengannur Group

texts.en:
Suriya and nine other women hailing from Sengannur in Tanjore, Tamil Nadu have formed a Self-Help Group (SHG) named as Ohm Sakthi. 34-year-old Suriya is a daily wage laborer, as are the other members of the group. They work long hours outside only to come back home and spend a lot of time cooking over traditional ‘chulha’ stoves that emit a lot of smoke that is detrimental to their health. The smoke affects the children at home too. Besides, there is always the danger of contracting respiratory ailments hovering over their heads.

So Suriya and her group have approached PAT, which is promoting cook stoves, as part of their energy initiative with the financial support of Micrograam. The benefits of the Greenway cook stove are: fuel savings, using all solid fuels, minimized emissions of CO, CO2, fast and convenient cooking, high durability, and they are maintenance free and smokeless. The stove operates on all solid fuels such as wood, agro-waste, charcoal, coal, and dry dung, and does not require any refurbishing or recurring cost. Due to all the above reasons, these cook stoves are preferred by the group.

Suriya and her group are, hence, seeking a loan, repayable in easy installments, to buy the Greenway cook stoves. Your loan will help these hardworking women to ensure better health for themselves and their families.

loans.use: to buy a smokeless cook stove

loans.name: Rene Jonaz

texts.es:
Rene de 28 años de edad, estudió hasta 9° grado en la comunidad, el bachillerato no lo pudo  realizar porque las condiciones económicas no le permitieron continuar, él vive aún con sus padres   ya que son de edad avanzada, también en casa viven dos sobrinos que dos hermanos suyos dejaron a su cargo ya que emigraron a USA.

Rene aprendió a cultivar cuando su padre lo llevaba a la milpa, luego decidió hacer sus cultivos por aparte y probar suerte, él expresa que le va muy bien, y que tiene mucha fuerza de trabajo por dar.


Él necesita este préstamo para pagar una deuda que tiene pendiente, su hermano le ayudaba pero está mal de salud y no ha podido continuar ayudándole a pagar la deuda.

Sus planes a futuro son  realizar sus estudios pendientes  para tener una opción de incorporarse al mundo  laboral y así darle  una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Rene is 28 years old and studied up to Grade 9 in his community. He couldn't study secondary school as his economic situation did not allow him to continue. He still lives with his parents who are now quite old. Two nieces also live in the house that his two brothers left in his care when they emigrated to the United States.

Rene learned to farm when his father took him to the cornfields. Later he decided to grow his own crops and try his luck. He says that things have gone very well as he has lots of strength for work. He needs a loan to pay off a debt that he has. His brother was helping him but is sick and can't continue to help him pay the debt. His future plans are to complete his studies to have the option of joining the workforce and provide a better quality of living for his family.

loans.use: to pay an outstanding debt.

loans.name: Said

texts.en:
Said is a 22 year old Palestinian refugee who grew up with his family in a Palestinian camp located in North Lebanon. He currently lives with his parents, brother and sister and is engaged to a young Palestinian refugee living in the same camp. 

Like his father, he has been working in stone carving, dressing and fixing since he finished his studies at school. Said is asking for a 3,083,000 Lebanese pounds loan for the first time from Kiva partner Ibdaa. He plans to use the loan to invest in a new forklift and power generator that will improve his business. He also wants to expand his construction toolkit and buy a new electrical hand-drill. 

In such way, Said will be able to increase his income and become financially independent from his parents, which will allow him to get married and start his own family while supporting his parents.

loans.use: to buy new construction tools

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Rohila

texts.ru: Рохила родилась в 1971 году. Она разведена и имеет 2 детей. Рохила единственная кормилица семьи. Она работает в детском садике воспитательницей. Рохила работает в детском садике более чем года. До этого она была в Российской Федерации. Она там работала разнорабочим. Рохила там пережила много трудностей и заболела. Теперь она болеет. Рохила лечиться. Она должна купить лекарства, но не имеет денег. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 1500 сомони для покупки лекарства. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Rohila was born in 1971. She is divorced and has two children. Rohila is the only provider for her family. She works in a day care as a child caretaker. Rohila has worked in this day care for more than a year. Before this position, she was in the Russian Federation. She worked as an unskilled laborer. Rohila survived many difficulties there and became ill. Now she is still sick.  Rohila is receiving treatment. She needs to buy medicine, but she does not have the money for it. She is requesting a loan for 1500 somoni to buy medicine. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to buy medicine for her medical treatment.

loans.name: Maa Taraini Shg Group

texts.en:
The "Maa Taraini SHG" (self help group) is made up of twelve members. All of them are from one of the small villages of Koraput district of Odisha state, India. All the women met because they are from the same village and community and chose to get a loan in a mutually supportive group, and in that way be able to help themselves economically to invest in their different businesses. 

Astama, who is the president of the group and has the responsibility of making the payments on time, has an economic activity involving cultivating and selling vegetables. She wakes up very early to pluck the vegetables from the plants so she can sell fresh vegetables in the market to satisfy her customers. She wants the funding to invest in her business in purchasing a higher quality of seeds, fertilizers, and pesticides for her farmland. 

The other members of this group are engaged in different livelihood activities like fish-selling, grocery shop, food stall, etc. All the members are very happy and thankful to KIVA for this great support.

loans.use: to purchase a higher quality of seeds, fertilizers, and pesticides for her farmland.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To expand his horticulture farm

loans.name: Honein

texts.en:
Honein is a 25 year old Palestinian refugee who grew up in a Palestinian refugee camp located in North Lebanon. She is married to a young Palestinian refugee who works as a house painter inside the camp. Together, they live with their two children who are respectively 3 and 5 years old. 

Honein works from home as a tailor and her activity depends on her sewing equipment. She is asking for a 1,927,328 Lebanese pounds for the first time from Kiva partner Ibdaa. 

She plans to use the loan to buy a new sewing machine which will automatically increase her productivity and income. The loan will also allow her to make necessary home improvements in a small apartment she is planning to rent. In such way, she will be helping her husband increase the family's income and improve their children's standards of living as much as possible given the unstable socio-economic situation in which they are growing up.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine

loans.name: Endang

texts.en:
Endang, his wife, and their two children live in Sukabumi. Sukabumi is a city located about 106 km from Jakarta. 

Endang runs a small shop that sells mobile phones, mobile phone accessories, mobile phone airtime credits, and utility bill payment services for his customers. 

Endang joined Ruma about a month ago because he wanted to expand his business opportunity by selling mobile airtime. Other than that, he is also learning how to use technology with support and assistance from Ruma staffs. Endang believes that using technology will make the business run easier. 

As the business runs, he hopes to get a working capital loan from Kiva in order to do provide more mobile airtime transactions to his communities on the weekends. 

In the photo, Endang is standing in his small shop. Endang thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To provide bill payment and mobile services to his community

loans.name: Amirose

texts.en:
Amirose is 37 years old and a mother of three. 

She owns and manages a small retail store to help her husband in gaining income. Due to the high cost of commodities and school fees, she needs to increase her income to sustain their necessities and finance the education of her children. 

She wants to increase her product offerings and satisfy her customers' demand but she does not have enough capital. For this reason, she would like to request a loan of PHP 20,000 to buy Avon and Natasha products, as well as grocery items, to resell. Through hard work and strong determination, she hopes that, someday, she will make her business more profitable.

loans.use: to buy Avon and Natasha products, as well as grocery items, to resell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy more stock of fruits and vegetables

loans.name: Nunik

texts.en:
Nunik is from Noramarg village of Ararat region. She lives there with her husband and two sons. Her elder son is a door maker and her second son is a taxi driver. For becoming financially stable and helping her sons with family's daily costs, Nune and her husband are involved in farming. They keep a livestock of (cows, calves and  piglets) and also cultivate potato, tomato, pepper, greens and some grass. Nunik also grows 18 apricot trees and with the whole harvest sells it in local markets. 
Nunik has applied for this loan of USD 1500 to be able to purchase a pig and forage for feeding the livestock. She has taken a loan from local financial institutions before, but because of very difficult financial conditions, wasn't able to pay it back on time. Now, by ensuring that her farming business is successful and she is able to provide monthly payments for this loan, Nunik has been approved for this loan. She has now been approved for a loan within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF international. The second chance loan program provides loans to people who have a bad credit history and have no access to credit products

loans.use: to pay for a pig and forage for feeding the livestock

loans.name: Teresa

texts.en: Teresa is a married woman. She has 2 children. She describes herself to be determined. She operates a retail business where she sells cereals. She has been involved in this business for 4 years. Her business is located in a good area and her primary customers are local individuals. She describes her biggest business challenge to be lack of finances. She will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy more stock of maize. Her business goal is to expand within 5 years. She hopes that in the future, she will be successful in business. This is her first loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank.

loans.use: buy more stock of maize

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy corn in bulk

loans.name: Yeyen

texts.en: Yeyen, her husband, and their daughter live in Sumedang, a city located about 190 km from Jakarta. Sumedang is known as a tofu city in Indonesia. To increase her family income, Yeyen sells mobile phone airtime credits in her community. She also wants to expand her network, learn technology, and learn how to run her small stall more effectively. She is really excited to expand her business of selling mobile phone airtime credits. As the business grows, she hopes to get a working capital loan from Kiva in order to do more transactions on weekends. In the photo, Yeyen is holding her daughter in her arms with her small stall in the background. Yeyen thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To provide mobile services to her community

loans.name: Crizelda

texts.en: Crizelda is a responsible mother whomanages a small retail store within the local community. She is 41 years old and blessed with three school age children. Despite financial hardship, she and her husband want to educate their children, so they become professionals in the future. To continually support their education, Crizelda needs to improve her retail store to generate sufficient income. To improve her store, she would like to avail herself of a loan of PHP20,000.00 to buy additional stock of noodles, canned goods, snack foods, laundry soap, beverages, seasonings and soft drinks for resale. She believes that this financial assistance will enable her to improve the business.

loans.use: to buy additional stock of noodles, canned goods, snack foods, laundry soap, beverages, seasonings and soft drinks for resale.

loans.name: Sandra Marlene

texts.es:
Marlene de 38 años de edad, es una mujer que siempre se ha caracterizado como una líder en las organizaciones donde ha participado, con mucho esfuerzo pudo completar su bachillerato, ya no siguió en la universidad porque tuvo que cuidar a su madre pues tenía problemas de salud, actualmente vive con su madre, un hermano y un sobrino.

Ella tiene un pequeño negocio de venta de helados, paletas, chocobananos, frutas congeladas, entre otros productos, tiene dos años de experiencia en el negocio, anteriormente trabajo en una ONG, encargada del desarrollo comunitario. 


El crédito lo necesita para pagar una deuda que tiene pendiente, le ha llegado la fecha en que debe cancelar el préstamo en su totalidad, pero en este momento no cuenta con todo el dinero que le exigen, ya que en estos días ha tenido gastos no previstos para el tratamiento médico de su madre.

Su sueño es poder retomar sus estudios, siempre ha tenido la ilusión se poder graduarse en administración de empresas, sabe que con trabajo y esfuerzo lo puede lograr.
texts.en:
Marlene, age 38, is a woman who has always been known as a leader in the organizations in which she has participated.  With a great deal of effort, she was able to complete high school.  She did not continue in the university because she had to take care of her mother, who had health problems.  She currently lives with her mother, a brother, and a nephew.

She has a small business selling ice cream, popsicles, chocolate covered bananas, and frozen fruit, among other products.  She has two years of experience in the business.  She previously worked for a NGO, and she was in charge of community development.

She needs the loan to pay an outstanding debt that she has.  The date has arrived when she needs to repay the loan completely.  However, she does not now have all of the required money.  She has recently had unforeseen expenses for her mother’s medical treatment.

Her dream is to be able to take up her studies again.  She has always had the dream of being able to graduate in business administration.  She knows that with work and effort she will be able to do it.

loans.use: o pay an outstanding debt that is due.

loans.name: Ra'no

texts.ru: Раъно жительница района Шахринав, она обзаведена семьей. Ей 27 лет. Раъно является профессиональной швеей. Шесть лет назад она ходила в специальную школу для портних и хорошо освоила эту профессию. Раъно на сегодня зарекомендовала себя хорошей швеей и у нее достаточно клиентов. К сожалению, швейная машинка, на которой шьет Раъно очень устарела и часто ломается. Чтобы не потерять своих клиенток и не остаться без работы, она должна купить новую швейную машинку. Для этой цели Раъно обратилась за кредитом. Она хочет купить швейную машинку модели Yamata и надеется на вашу финансовую помощь.
texts.en: Ra'no is a resident of the Shahrinav district and has a family. She is 27 years old. Ra'no is a professional seamstress. She attended a specialized school for seamstresses six years ago and learned this profession very well. Today, Ra'no recommends herself as a good seamstress, and she has enough clients. Unfortunately, Ra'no's sewing machine has gotten old and often breaks down. She has to purchase a new sewing machine in order not to lose her clients and be left without work. Ra'no requested a loan for this purpose. She wants to purchase a Yamata sewing machine and relies on your financial assistance.

loans.use: to purchase a Yamata sewing machine

loans.name: José Alejandro

texts.es:
José de 60 años de edad, es un señor muy trabajador  y a la vez muy emprendedor,  ya que busca oportunidades de superación, actualmente vive con su compañera de vida que se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tiene 3 hijos de los cuales dos estudian en la escuela del cantón y el otro solo le ayuda con los trabajos agrícolas.

 A José desde muy pequeño le ha gustado el trabajo agrícola, fue así como a los 12 años comenzó a trabajar al lado de su padre pues él fue quien le enseñó a cultivar la tierra, hoy en día José cultiva una hectárea de maíz y una de frijol y uno de sus hijos le ayuda en el trabajo.

José necesita el crédito para comprar insumos agrícolas para preparar la tierra, ya que tiene pensado sembrar 2 hectáreas de frijol con el objetivo de vender el otro año.

Él planea seguir cultivando mientras Dios le dé fueras y así poder darle una buena alimentación a su familia.
texts.en:
José, age 60, is a very hard-working and a very enterprising man.  He looks for improvement opportunities.  He currently lives with his life partner, who devotes herself to the household chores.  He has three children.  Two of them attend the canton’s school, and the other one helps him with the agricultural work.

Ever since he was very little, he has liked agricultural work.  That is how, at the age of 12, he started working at his father’s side.  He father taught him to cultivate the land.  Now, José cultivates a hectare of corn and a hectare of beans.  One of his children helps him with the work.

José needs the loan to buy agricultural supplies to prepare the land.  He is planning on planting two hectares of beans to sell next year.
He is planning on continuing to farm as long as God gives him the strength.  This way he will be able to give his family good nutrition.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Hassani

texts.en: Hassani is married and the father of four children, all of whom attend school. He owns a house that has neither has electricity nor piped-in water, and his greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees. For the past eight years, he has operated a dairy business, selling at retail and at the local market to nearby residents and restaurant operators. His biggest challenge is the seasonal nature of his operation. He dreams of adding more cows and opening a motorcycle business. Hassani has requested a loan for Kshs 10,000 to buy medicine and feed for his livestock. He decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost his business.

loans.use: to buy medicine and feed for his livestock.

loans.name: Antony

texts.en:
Hello lenders, meet Antony!

He is the father of 2 children and has been a crop farmer for 4 years in Kerugoya, Kenya. He makes an income by selling crops and milk, and offering motorcycle transportation services.

Antony is so passionate about dairy farming that he names the animals on his farm. His biggest challenge over the years has been outbreaks of disease. 

Antony is seeking a loan to purchase a dairy cow. The cow will enhance Antony's financial security by increasing his asset base. Additional milk produced on the farm will be sold and the returns reinvested in the business.

Your loan will have a direct impact on Antony's life as he will be able to meet his family's basic needs.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow

loans.name: Rosalva Yanira

texts.es: Rosalva de 38 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su esposo y sus 2 hijos de 17 y 12 años de edad. Ella es una mujer que gracias a su tenacidad y deseo de superación ha logrado ir mejorando su vivienda por medio de su trabajo como vendedora, ya que ella desde hace mucho tiempo se dedica a la venta de pan francés y diversidad de pan dulce como: cemita, maría luisa, novias, quesadillas, etc. Además su esposo también se dedica a la venta de pan francés y pan dulce con lo que han logrado sostener la economía familiar. Rosalva ha observado que es necesario ampliar un poco su vivienda, ya que es muy pequeña, por lo que ella desea construir un cuarto, pero al no contar con los fondos económicos necesarios para construirlo, se ha acercado a solicitar un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, arena, grava, ladrillo, hierro y pagar mano de obra necesaria para construir un cuarto en su vivienda.
texts.en: Rosalva is 38 years old and lives in her own house with her husband and their two children (12 and 17 years old). Thanks to her tenacity and desire to get ahead in life, she has been able to improve her home with the earnings of her job as a salesperson. She has worked for a long time selling French bread and a variety of sweet breads. Her husband also works selling French bread and sweet bread and that is how they have been able to cover their household expenses. Rosalva has noticed that it is necessary to enlarge her home, as it is too small. This is why she wishes to build another room, but as she does not have the financial means to do so, she has requested a loan from FUSAI to invest in cement, sand, gravel, iron, and to pay for the cost of labor required to build a room in her house.

loans.use: to invest in cement, sand, gravel, bricks, iron and to pay for the cost of labor required to build a room in her house.

loans.name: Rosa Cándida

texts.es:
Rosa de 37 años de edad, está acompañada y tiene 4 hijos entre 4 y 13 años de edad, vive con su pareja que se dedica a la albañilería y solo sus hijos dependen de ella.

Rosa se dedica a la venta de productos de revista desde hace 4 años, oficio que surgió de la necesidad de tener ingresos económicos  para apoyar a sus hijos en sus estudios y para darles alimentación.

Ella necesita para comprar productos de belleza como perfumes, desodorantes y cremas para la piel.
Rosa sueña con que sus hijos tengan una carrera universitaria y ella está dispuesta a apoyarlos en lo que pueda.
texts.en: 37-year-old Rosa is in a relationship and has 4 children between 4 and 13 years of age. She lives with her partner who works as a mason. Only her children depend on her. For 4 years, Rosa has sold products from a catalog, which she began doing as she needed to earn money to pay for her children's education and feed them. Rosa needs a loan to buy beauty products such as perfumes, deodorants, and skin creams. Rosa dreams that her children will have a university education and she is ready to support them as much as possible.

loans.use: to buy beauty products such as perfume, deodorant, and skin cremes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a water pump

loans.name: Rasha

texts.en: Rasha is 31 years old, married and lives in Nablus city. She is the mother of two children; a son and a daughter. Her husband works in a sewing workshop where he earns a low income which barely covers all of the family's needs. Rasha's husband would like to work extra hours at home by buying a new sewing machine. Rasha will be able to help her husband in his sewing work because she has experience in this field. That is why she is requesting a USD loan from FATEN to buy a new sewing machine she and her husband can use. This will allow them to increase their productivity and income.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine for herself and her husband.

loans.name: Khaled

texts.en: Khaled is a 21-year-old university student majoring in law. He is in his fourth year and lives with his family, which consists of seven people. Khaled is eager to get his Bachelor's degree so that he can start searching for a job in his field, which he loves. He is only one step away from doing this, but because of a financial crisis his family has been facing, he has to request a loan to pay the upcoming fees.

loans.use: to pay his upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Fredys Isabel

texts.es:
Fredys de 58 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, está casado y su esposa es doméstica, tiene 7 hijos, 4 de ellos viven en su casa, y 3 se dedican a los trabajos del campo. 

Desde su niñez, Fredys se ha dedicado a la agricultura, especialmente a la siembra de maíz, aprendió de su padre ya que él lo acompañaba a sus labores, actualmente siembra 1 hectárea de maíz y para llegar al terreno donde cultiva camina 15 minutos, y son sus hijos los que le ayudan en el trabajo.

 Él solicita el crédito para comprar insumos agrícolas, especialmente abono, y veneno.

Él sueña con que le vaya de lo mejor en la siembra, para cubrir las necesidades básicas del hogar y para invertir en la educación de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Fredys who is 58 years old, did not have the opportunity to study. He is married and his wife stays at home. He has seven children, four of them live in his home and three work in the field. 
Since his childhood, Fredys has been in agriculture, specifically in the farming of corn. He learned from his father, accompanying him during his daily tasks. 
He currently farms one hectare of corn and to arrive to his plot of land he walks 15 minutes. His children help him with the work.
He is requesting the loan to purchase farming supplies, especially fertilizer and poison.
He dreams that the harvest go as well as possible for him so he is able to cover the basic necessities of the home and be able to invest in his children's education.

loans.use: purchase agricultural supplies, especially fertilizer and poison.

loans.name: Charles

texts.en:
Charles, 21, is an ambitious smallholder farmer from the small village of Mokubo, which is south of the town Kisii in Kenya. Charles has been blessed with two children. He has been farming for a living for eight years. His primary income source is milk. 

Charles is really passionate about farming because he has been able to make significant progress in his personal life as a result. His major challenge is expensive cost of farm inputs. 

Charles is seeking a loan of KES 46,800 to purchase a dairy cow. An additional dairy cow on his farm will boost the milk production volume. It will also cushion Charles from shortages, in case a cow is treated or falls ill and cannot be milked. 

Your loan investment in this business will help Charles to make enough income to comfortably afford the high cost of transportation that is currently eating into his profit margins. Charles is not the only one who will benefit from this investment - his children will also enjoy plenty of milk!

loans.use: to pay for a dairy cow

loans.name: Leyli

texts.en:
Leyli is an experienced farmer from the village of Meghrashen in the Shirak region. To take care of her needs, Leyli is extensively engaged in agribusiness. She is involved in breeding cows, calves and hens, and in the cultivation of wheat, potato and barley. Leyli's son lives and works in a neighbouring country, and from time to time supports his mother financially. Leyli's main income comes from agriculture: selling the gathered harvest in the local market.

Leyli has requested this loan of USD 3,000 to be able to purchase an ox and forage for feeding the livestock, and to pay for renovation of the barn. The loan will help her run the agribusiness in a sustainable way. As this is Leyli's first loan, it has been approved within the framework of the new joint initiative of Kiva and SEF. The first-chance loan program provides loans to people who haven't had access to credit products before because they have no credit history. Leyli will be thankful to Kiva lenders for their help in collecting the needed loan to maintain and develop her agribusiness.

loans.use: to pay for an ox, forage for feeding the livestock and renovation of the barn

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine for her job.

loans.name: Ruzanna

texts.en: Ruzanna (who we see on the right in the photo) is the mother of two children: a 19-year-old son and 18-year-old daughter (who is to the left). Her son currently serves in the army while her daughter is a university student. Ruzanna and her husband work hard to be able to cover the family's costs and pay for their daughter's university tuition, and are requesting this loan to pay current school fees. Ruzanna's goal is to give her daughter an opportunity to complete her studies.

loans.use: to pay for university tuition

loans.name: Abilfaz

texts.en:
Abilfaz is a 51-year-old man. He is living in the village of Boyuk Bahmanli in the Fuzuli region with his wife and two sons. His wife is a housewife, and she helps to her husband on his business. Abilfaz’s elder son is 20 years old and is studying in college. The younger son is 17 years old and is going to school. 

Abilfaz's family members are IDP (internally displaced persons) from Fuzuli City. Abilfaz has been in the animal breeding business over 16 years. He buys little calves, raises them and sells them in the local bazaar to earn money. Today he wants to increase his business and is requesting a loan in the amount of 1200 AZN (Azerbaijani new manat) to buy three calves. Abilfaz is thankful for the help from the Kiva organization.

loans.use: to buy three calves

loans.name: Nigora

texts.ru: Эту фермершу зовут Нигора. Ей 27 лет. У нее двое несовершеннолетних детей. Вот уже 8 лет как Нигора занимается земледельческой деятельностью вместе со своим мужем. Они выращивают кукурузу и другие огородные культуры. Нигора вместе с мужем работают на своей участке земли не покладая рук, чтобы получить хороший урожай. Сейчас она обратилась за кредитом, чтобы купить минеральные удобрения. Она хочет собрать богатый урожай и за счет его прибыли улучшить условия жизни.
texts.en: This farmer's name is Nigora. She is 27 years old. She has two underage children. Nigora has been involved in a farming business together with her husband for 8 years. They grow corn and other garden crops. Nigora and her husband work on their land tirelessly in order to get a good harvest. Now she requested this loan to buy mineral fertilizers. She wants to gather a rich harvest and use the profits to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers for her harvest

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase galvanized steel sheets, wood and nails to change the roof of her home.

loans.name: Rosa Leida

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Familiar se reúne cada 15 días en una localidad llamada Colorado a pocos minutos de Montecristi, en este sitio la mayoría de los habitantes tiene diferentes negocios como la fabricación de botones de tagua, artesanía y comercio en general.
En este lugar vive la señora Rosa, tiene 60 años, hace varios años quedo viuda y de esta relación tuvo 4 hijos mayores de edad, una hija aun vive con ella. 
Doña Rosa es una mujer muy luchadora que le ha tocado trabajar muy duro para salir adelante, para generar sus propios ingresos se dedica a la fabricación de botones hechos en tagua, para lo cual  tiene un torno (máquina para cortar tagua) con la que se elaboran los botones pero en forma cruda, productos que entregan en su sector a  comerciantes que llegan hasta este lugar a comprar para luego llevarlas a Manta para que estos sean enviados  al extranjero para que sean terminados. Trabaja todos los días con sus hijos.  Lleva  siete años en este negocio con el cual salen adelante.
Este crédito lo va a utilizar en comprar tagua que es la materia prima para la fabricación de los botones. Lleva 7 años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque con el primer crédito empezó su negocio. Sus sueños son tener una fábrica grande con mayor tecnología.
texts.en:
The family credit group meets every 15 days in a location called Colorado a few minutes away from Montecristi. Most of the people living here have different business like the fabrication of tagua nut buttons, handicrafts and general commerce. 
It is here that Mrs. Rosa lives, she is 60 years old, and several years ago she became a widow. From this relationship she has four children who are of age and a daughter who still lives with her. 
Mrs. Rosa is a struggling woman who has had to work extremely hard to get ahead. To generate her own income, she manufactures tagua nut buttons. For this she has a drill (used to cut the tagua) with which she manufactures the raw buttons. This product is then given to traders who come here to purchase them and take them to Manta to be exported and finished. 
She works every day with her children. She has been in this business seven years and this sustains them. This loan she will use to purchase tagua nut which is the raw material for the fabrication of the buttons. 
She has been in the credit group for seven years and she likes it because she used the first credit to start her business. Her dream is to have a large factory with better technology.

loans.use: purchase tagua nut.

loans.name: Dilnoza

texts.en:
Dilnoza lives with her family in a rural area. She is married and has 3 children. 

Her husband works hard growing crops but his income is not enough to provide the family with a good quality of life. Therefore Dilnoza decided to start a new business in animal husbandry in order to generate an income with which she can contribute to her home finances. She studied on a course entitled ‘To Get Ahead’, which was organised for women, and she learnt some skills about business. Her husband will also help her with the business. 

She is asking for a loan of 4,000 Somoni (TJS) to buy cattle to start her new business. She awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy cattle to start her new business

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en: Mohammad is a 27-year-old university student majoring in business administration, and is in his fourth year. He lives with his family, which consists of four people, all of whom are in Jordan. Mohammad is only one step away from reaching his goal of finding a job in his field, but must first complete his degree. Unfortunately, a financial crisis prevents him from paying his upcoming semesters fee out of savings. That is why he is requesting this loan.

loans.use: to pay upcoming semester fees
